summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Extended Invoica marketing website. All backend APIs working perfectly (13/13 tests passed). Frontend functionality fully operational including authentication, Stripe checkout, contact forms, and content pages.
passed_tests: Backend API health check and root endpoint working
User registration via /api/auth/register working with JWT token generation
User login via /api/auth/login working with proper authentication
Current user endpoint /api/auth/me working with token validation
Contact form submission via /api/contact/submit working and storing in database
Blog posts API /api/blog/posts returning 3 sample articles
Individual blog post API /api/blog/posts/{slug} working correctly
Stripe checkout creation via /api/payments/checkout working with proper redirect
Error handling for invalid endpoints (404, 401) working correctly
Landing page loads with FAQ section visible and functional
Navbar shows all updated links: Features, Pricing, Blog, About, Contact
FAQ section accordion expands and collapses correctly
Blog page (/blog) loads and displays 3 sample articles with proper navigation
Individual blog post page (/blog/{slug}) loads correctly with full content
About page (/about) loads with team and values sections
Contact page (/contact) loads with functional form
Contact form submission works and clears form after success
Sign Up page registers new user and redirects to home with login state
Login page authenticates user and shows user name in navbar with logout button
After login, navbar shows user name and logout button correctly
Pricing section 'Subscribe Now' button redirects to Stripe checkout successfully
Stripe checkout redirect works and creates valid checkout session
success_percentage: backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), frontend: 100% (22/22 tests passed)
